searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT rac.PKID PKID, rac.CASE_CODE, rac.RANSOM_CODE, pro.PROPERTY_ADDR, toc.AGENT_NAME, toc.GRP_NAME, rac.BORROWER_NAME, rac.COM_ORG_CODE, rac.RANSOM_STATUS, rac.STOP_REASON, rac.BORRO_MONEY, rac.UPDATE_TIME, app.ISAPPLY FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE rac INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO pro ON pro.CASE_CODE = rac.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO toc ON toc.CASE_CODE = pro.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS tai ON tai.RANSOM_CODE = rac.RANSOM_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_PARTICIPANT part ON rac.CASE_CODE = part.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_APPLY app ON app.RANSOM_CODE = rac.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW inter ON inter.RANSOM_CODE = app.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rep ON rep.RANSOM_CODE = inter.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL can ON can.RANSOM_CODE = rep.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM red ON red.RANSOM_CODE = can.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT pay ON pay.RANSOM_CODE = red.RANSOM_CODE WHERE 1 = 1 <ifNotNull isApply> AND app.ISAPPLY = 0 </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull ransomStatus> AND RANSOM_STATUS = #ransomStatus# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull ransomProperty> AND RANSOM_PROPERTY = #ransomProperty# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull teamCode> AND AGENT_NAME = #AGENT_NAME# </ifNotNull> <if test="searchInfo==0 and inTextVal != null and inTextVal != '' "> AND PROPERTY_ADDR like '%'+#inTextVal#+'%' </if> <if test="searchInfo==1 and inTextVal != null and inTextVal != ''"> AND AGENT_NAME like '%'+#inTextVal#+'%' </if> <if test="searchInfo==2 and inTextVal != null and inTextVal != ''"> AND BORROWER_NAME like '%'+#inTextVal#+'%' </if>
<if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMAPPLY'"> AND app.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND app.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if> <if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMINTERVIEW'"> AND inter.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND inter.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if> <if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMREPAYMENT'"> AND rep.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND rep.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if>
<if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMDIYA'"> AND can.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND can.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if> <if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMPERMIT'"> AND rep.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND rep.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if> <if test="ransomSearchTime=='RANSOMPAYMENT'"> AND pay.CREATE_TIME = #start# AND pay.UPDATE_TIME = #end# </if>
searchSql.groupSql: GROUP BY rac.PKID, rac.CASE_CODE, rac.RANSOM_CODE, pro.PROPERTY_ADDR, toc.AGENT_NAME, toc.GRP_NAME, rac.BORROWER_NAME, rac.COM_ORG_CODE, rac.RANSOM_STATUS, rac.STOP_REASON, rac.BORRO_MONEY, rac.UPDATE_TIME, app.isApply

searchSql.baseSql: SELECT rc.RANSOM_CODE, rc.BORROWER_NAME, rc.BORROWER_TEL, (SELECT PROPERTY_ADDR from sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO pro WHERE pro.CASE_CODE = rc.CASE_CODE) PROPERTY_ADDR, (SELECT AGENT_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO ci WHERE ci.CASE_CODE = rc.CASE_CODE) AGENT_NAME, rc.RANSOM_STATUS, rt.SIGN_TIME, rt.PLAN_TIME, ri.INTERVIEW_TIME, rr.REPAY_TIME, rca.CANCEL_TIME, rre.REDEEM_TIME, rp.PAYMENT_TIME, rt.REST_MONEY, rt.LOAN_MONEY, ri.INTERVIEW_MONEY, rr.REPAY_MONEY FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE rc LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS rt ON rc.RANSOM_CODE = rt.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW ri ON ri.RANSOM_CODE = rt.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rr ON rr.RANSOM_CODE = ri.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL rca ON rca.RANSOM_CODE = rr.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM rre ON rre.RANSOM_CODE = rca.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT rp ON rp.RANSOM_CODE = rre.RANSOM_CODE

SELECT rc.CASE_CODE, rc.RANSOM_CODE, rc.RANSOM_PROPERTY,
CASE app.PART_CODE WHEN 'DEAL' THEN rt.PLAN_TIME END dealTime, CASE app.PART_CODE WHEN 'APPLY' THEN app.APPLY_TIME END applyTime, CASE ri.PART_CODE WHEN 'SIGN' THEN ri.INTERVIEW_TIME END signTime, CASE rr.PART_CODE WHEN 'PAYLOAN_ONE' THEN rr.REPAY_TIME END paylonOne,
CASE rr.PART_CODE WHEN 'PAYLOAN_TWO' THEN rr.REPAY_TIME END paylonTwo, CASE rca.PART_CODE WHEN 'CANCELDIYA_ONE' THEN rca.CANCEL_TIME END cancelOne, CASE rca.PART_CODE WHEN 'CANCELDIYA_TWO' THEN rca.CANCEL_TIME END cancelTwo,
CASE rre.PART_CODE WHEN 'RECEIVE_ONE' THEN rre.REDEEM_TIME END receiveOne, CASE rre.PART_CODE WHEN 'RECEIVE_TWO' THEN rre.REDEEM_TIME END receiveTwo, CASE rp.PART_CODE WHEN 'PAYCLEAR' THEN rp.PAYMENT_TIME END payclear,
(SELECT REAL_NAME FROM sctrans.SYS_USER sy WHERE rc.UPDATE_USER = sy.ID) UPDATE_USER FROM sctrans.T_RA_CASE rc LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_TAILINS rt ON rc.RANSOM_CODE = rt.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_INTERVIEW ri ON ri.RANSOM_CODE = rt.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REPAY rr ON rr.RANSOM_CODE = ri.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_CANCEL rca ON rca.RANSOM_CODE = rr.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_REDEEM rre ON rre.RANSOM_CODE = rca.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_PAYMENT rp ON rp.RANSOM_CODE = rre.RANSOM_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RA_APPLY app ON app.RANSOM_CODE = rp.RANSOM_CODE WHERE rc.RANSOM_CODE = #ransomCode#
